name: Space Waitress
description:
You wake up in a small spacecraft parked at a space station. You have no memory of who you are, where you are, or how you got there. the only thing you know... oh wait are you hungry?

Space Waitress is a restaurant runner type game set in a diner in space. Wait tables and get to know your coworkers as you do your job to learn more about your surroundings and make a plan for your future. 

CONTROLS

Movement: WASD

Interact: F

Close window: E or ESC

Note: the interaction spot for the table of customers is further under the table than you'd think. its kinda under the arrow and under the table. Also yes I know the food ordering system is broken and they don't tell you what they want, we are working on fixing that.  feel free to walk around in the meantime and look at all the food selection menus and the lovely dialogue options for the customers. This is definately still a work in progress

In addition, Please help me out by filling out this Playtest survey:

https://forms.gle/gX4Vbr9LZWea3S8w

thanks!
